id: scenario-value-scanner-idd-community-scenarios-community-participating in idd cultural events and celebrations
title: Participating in IDD cultural events and celebrations
description: Participating in IDD cultural events and celebrations
content:
Scenario: Participating in IDD cultural events and celebrations
    Given the IDD community is hosting a pride celebration
    And the event celebrates IDD culture, identity, and accomplishments
    When Jordan attends the celebration
    Then the personal_agent provides event details accessibly
    And the entire event is designed for cognitive accessibility
    And Jordan sees IDD peers being celebrated for their contributions
    And Jordan participates in activities, performances, and community
    And Jordan experiences IDD pride and cultural affirmation
    And Jordan rejects ableist narratives of tragedy and burden
    And Jordan celebrates disability as difference and community strength
